titleSection.name: Tandemseven UX360 Integration for VersionOne
titleSection.shortDescription: Harmonize user experience research with agile project plans.

descriptionSection.description:
## Solving the Hard Problems in Agile Software Development
The integration of TandemSevenâ€™s UX360 with VersionOne's industry-leading Agile Management tool enables VersionOne customers to use UX360 to solve one of the hardest problems in agile software development: maximizing the value of UX design to improve story quality and accelerate velocity.
## The Problem
Most companies now conduct extensive customer and user research, but have challenges translating this data into measurable application value. Traditional research and design methods do not produce the organized, prioritized, and packaged deliverables agile development teams need to become more productive. Therefore, UX value and talent are often sub-optimized, operating only within tactical sprint teams. While this definitely improves product usability, larger concerns about branded experience and orchestrating flows across epics, across channels, and within product themes cannot be communicated effectively with a purely tactical approach.
## The Solution
TandemSeven's Enterprise UX platform UX360 overcomes these issues by organizing research and design activities in one agile-friendly framework, and taking advantage of VersionOne's native APIs to integrate design deliverables seamlessly into Iteration Zero and downstream sprint team activities.
